DOC.brief_summary: This is the first multiple-dose experience in humans with MOA-728 in an oral formulation. This study will provide an assessment of the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics (PK) of MOA-728 following administration of ascending multiple oral doses to healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety of MOA-728 Administered Orally to Healthy Subjects
